exposurecontrol: Programmed auto exposure with flexible program, shutter-priority auto, aperture-priority auto, manual, exposure bracketing enabled, exposure compensation (-2.0 EV - +2.0 EV in steps of 1/3 EV) enabled
weight: Approx. 565 g (1 lb 4 oz) (including battery and SD memory card)
supportedlanguages: Arabic, Bengali, Bulgarian, Chinese (Simplified and Traditional), Czech, Danish, Dutch, English, Finnish, French, German, Greek, Hindi, Hungarian, Indonesian, Italian, Japanese, Korean, Marathi, Norwegian, Persian, Polish, Portuguese (European and Brazilian), Romanian, Russian, Serbian, Spanish, Swedish, Tamil, Telugu, Thai, Turkish, Ukrainian, Vietnamese

continuousshooting: Single (default setting), Continuous H (the frame rate for continuous shooting is about 7 fps and the maximum number of continuous shots is about 7), Continuous L (the frame rate for continuous shooting is about 1 fps and the maximum number of continuous shots is about 200), Pre-shooting cache (the frame rate for continuous shooting is about 15 fps and the maximum number of continuous shots is 20, including a maximum of 5 frames captured in the pre-shooting cache), Continuous H:120 fps (the frame rate for continuous shooting is about 120 fps and the maximum number of continuous shots is 60), Continuous H:60 fps (the frame rate for continuous shooting is about 60 fps and the maximum number of continuous shots is 60), BSS (Best Shot Selector), Multi-shot 16, Intvl timer shooting
media: Internal memory (approx. 56 MB), SD/SDHC/SDXC memory card
wifiwirelesslanstandards: IEEE 802.11b/g (standard wireless LAN protocol). ARIB STD-T66 (standard for low power data communication systems)
powersources: One Rechargeable Li-ion Battery EN-EL23 (included). AC Adapter EH-67A (available separately)
selftimer: Can be selected from 10 s and 2 s
focallength: 4.3-258 mm (angle of view equivalent to that of 24-1440 mm lens in 35mm [135] format)
condition: New: A brand-new, unused and undamaged item. See the seller's listing for full details. See all condition definitions - opens in a new window or tabBrand:Nikon
flashexposurecompensation: In steps of 1/3 EV in the range between -2 and +2 EV
dimensionswxhxd: Approx. 125.0 x 85.0 x 106.5 mm (5.0 x 3.4 x 4.2 in.) (excluding projections)
hdmioutput: Can be selected from Auto, 480p, 720p, and 1080i
lensconstruction: 16 elements in 11 groups (4 ED lens elements and 1 super ED lens element)
framecoverageplaybackmode: Approx. 100% horizontal and 100% vertical (compared to actual picture)
focusrange: [W]: Approx. 50 cm (1 ft 8 in.) to infinity, [T]: Approx. 2.0 m (6 ft 7 in.) to infinity. Macro close-up mode: Approx. 1 cm (0.4 in.) (at a wide-angle zoom position) to infinity. (All distances measured from center of front surface of lens)
flashcontrol: TTL auto flash with monitor preflashes
shutterspeed: 1/4000 * -1 s. 1/4000 * -15 s (when ISO sensitivity is 100 in M mode). * When the aperture value is set to f/7.6 (wide-angle end)
fileformats: Still pictures: JPEG. Sound files (voice memo): WAV. Movies: MOV (Video: H.264/MPEG-4 AVC, Audio: LPCM stereo)
monitor: 7.5 cm (3-in.), approx. 921k-dot (RGBW), wide viewing angle TFT LCD with anti-reflection coating and 6-level brightness adjustment, vari-angle TFT LCD

imagesensor: 1/2.3-in. type CMOS; approx. 16.76 million total pixels
digitalzoommagnification: Up to 4x (angle of view equivalent to that of approx. 5760 mm lens in 35mm [135] format)
framecoverageshootingmode: Approx. 100% horizontal and 100% vertical (compared to actual picture)
isosensitivitystandardoutputsensitivity: ISO 100-1600. ISO 3200, 6400 (available when using P, S, A or M mode). Hi 1 (equivalent to ISO 12800) (available when using High ISO monochrome in special effects mode)
